lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

Two people are dist meters apart.
They want to meet together, walking at speed kilometers per hour.
A dog starts moving from the first person, and runs to the second. When reaching the second, it runs back to the first again, then the second, etc...
The dog runs at dogSpeed kilometers per hour.
You have to find the traveled distance by the dog, in meters.
Input
Line 1 the 3 integers.
dist : the distance between the two persons at the beginning, in meters.
speed : the speed of the two people walking toward each other, in kilometers per hour.
dogSpeed : the speed of the dog, in kilometers per hour.
Output
Line 1 the distance traveled by the dog, in meters, rounded to the nearest integer.
Constraints
dist > 0
dogSpeed >= speed > 0
Example
Input
100 1 1
Output
50
